title: End of season rewards and leaverbuster
body: I just got a leaverbuster, my nets been playing up a lot and i dont mind leaverbuster punishing me for it, but does that make me ineligible for end of season rewards? I hope not D:

replies.body: From Leaver buster FAQ, leaver buster does not count as a ban. "However, it is possible to be punished for leaving just 1-2 games. Players who leave games will be placed in a low priority queue and will be required to play 5 matchmade games without leaving before exiting low priority queue." You can only lose your end of season rewards through more serious bans such as toxicity and what not. Just play out your leave buster games and expect rewards :3
Don't think so unless it's a leaver buster ban >3 days
